title: Companion Approval Guide
content: Auntie Ethel Sunlit Wetlands - Auntie Ethel's Teahouse. Cutscene will play when you meet her at the door. Agree to Ethel's deal Save Mayrina Requirement/s: When Auntie Ethel offer to remove the tadpole, take it. None Lae'zel -Shadowheart -Wyll - Auntie Ethel Sunlit Wetlands - Auntie Ethel's Teahouse. Cutscene will play when you meet her at the door. Agree to Ethel's deal and give her an eye Save Mayrina Requirement/s: When Auntie Ethel offer to remove the tadpole, take it. She will fail but you
